articles.author: Tad Walch
articles.title: As Netflix drops 'American Primeval,' how much do we know about its accuracy? - Deseret News
articles.description: The new Netflix series "American Primeval" is a highly fictionalized account of the Utah War, Brigham Young and the Mountain Meadows Massacre.
articles.content:
• The Netflix series 'American Primeval' examines key events and figures of 1857's Utah War through a fictional lens.
  • The creators intended to use historical fiction to depict the strug… [+8062 chars]
